level.heading: Rules.
level.text: The Mayor, pursuant to Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules necessary to implement the provisions of this subchapter.

level.heading: Cross References
level.text: Economic development zones, eligibility for tax incentives, see ยง 6-1504.

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 47-1808.09.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-202
level.text: For Law 18-202, see notes following ยง 47-1807.51.
